title: Ground News - Stowaway found in airplane undercarriage at Paris airport in critical condition: source
text:

author: Andrew McKay
title: The Nintendo Switch Is Getting A Screen Upgrade
text:
Image source Retro Remake is a company specialising in FPGA consoles and screen upgrades for handheld devices. Retro Remake’s SUPER5 Switch Lite replacement OLED screen was recently doing the rounds in the media. Now the company has announced its Switch OLED replacement screen for the base Nintendo Switch.
As shared on YouTube by Taki Udon, the YouTuber, tech enthusiast and a founder of Retro Remake. Taki Udon announced two SUPER 7 replacement screens for the regular Nintendo Switch. Both of these screen replacements are available for pre-order on Retro Remake’s website for a $5 deposit.
The two variants are as follows:
The SUPER7 IPS – A 7-inch replacement for the standard Nintendo Switch screen with more vibrant colours and a higher peak brightness but without touch support. The SUPER7 OLED Touch – A 7-inch replacement OLED Screen that also features a higher peak brightness and touch support. It’s essential to mention that both screen replacements will come in kit form requiring purchasers to do the modifications themselves. In order for the screens to work in the Switch form factor, it will require a new frame and shell. This will be included with the kit and will also feature an improved kick stand. Taki Udon goes into more detail in his YouTube video which is embedded below.
Taki mentioned that a simpler, beginner-friendly kit may also be available but for a higher cost. This would require less disassembly from the purchaser but will come at a greater cost. Unlike the SUPER7, Retro Remake’s SUPER5 Switch Lite upgrade worked with the standard housing of the Nintendo Switch Lite.
We recently covered Retro Remake’s FPGA SuperStation One. This FPGA device emulates the hardware of the PS1 and delivers a PlayStation 1 gaming experience that is as close to the original as one could probably get. If you’d like to find out more, click here .

author: Bettina Menzel
title: Minijob-Änderungen kommen - Millionen Beschäftigte profitieren von neuen Regelungen
text:
Minijob-Änderungen kommen – Millionen Beschäftigte profitieren von neuen Regelungen
Minijobber bekommen ab 2026 mehr Geld: Mit höherem Mindestlohn und angepasster Verdienstgrenze bleibt unterm Strich mehr Netto vom Brutto.
Berlin – Minijobber in Deutschland haben ab dem 1. Januar 2026 mehr Geld in der Tasche: Der gesetzliche Mindestlohn steigt auf 13,90 Euro pro Stunde. Die monatliche Verdienstgrenze für Minijobber erhöht sich entsprechend der dynamischen Kopplung an den Mindestlohn von derzeit 556 Euro auf voraussichtlich 603 Euro im Jahr 2026.
Wer also einen Minijob mit konstantem Stundenumfang hat, kann künftig mehr verdienen, ohne den Minijob-Status zu verlieren und in die Sozialversicherung zu rutschen. Für bestimmte Branchen gelten hingegen eigene Mindestlöhne aus Tarifverträgen, wie das Fachportal Minijob-Zentrale mitteilt. Das ist etwa im Gebäudereinigungsgewerbe, der Pflegebranche oder dem Elektrohandwerk der Fall.
Die maximale Arbeitszeit pro Monat bleibt weiterhin bei rund 43 Stunden. „Die Anhebung von Mindestlohn und Verdienstgrenze bei Minijobs bringt 2026 echten Mehrwert – vor allem für soziale Gruppen, die bisher am Existenzminimum gearbeitet haben“, kommentiert der Verein „Für soziales Leben“ die Änderungen. Die Experten mahnen jedoch: Nur wer sich über die Regelungen informiert und sauber abrechne, profitiere am Ende wirklich.
6,9 Millionen Minijobber profitieren: Ab 2027 erhöht sich die Verdienstgrenze nochmals
Rund 6,9 Millionen Minijobber gibt es in Deutschland. Ein Großteil von ihnen sind Frauen. Laut Daten der Bundesagentur für Arbeit leisteten Frauen im Jahr 2023 durchschnittlich 24 Prozent weniger Stunden Erwerbsarbeit als Männer. Viele arbeiten auch in Teilzeit. Es sei eine bessere Kinderbetreuung in Deutschland nötig, um diesen Trend zu stoppen, kommentierte der Chef des ifo-Instituts, Clemens Fuest.
Ab 1. Januar 2027 wird der Mindestlohn nochmals angehoben und steigt auf 14,60 Euro pro Stunde. Die Verdienstgrenze liegt dann voraussichtlich bei 633 Euro. Mehr Netto im Minijob stärkt auch die Binnennachfrage, wenn auch nur in geringem Ausmaß. Die deutsche Wirtschaft schrumpfte zuletzt zwei Jahre in Folge. Für 2025 sahen Experten wie etwa das Kieler Institut für Weltwirtschaft (IfW) zuletzt ein leichtes Wachstum voraus.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 科创创业ETF（159781）跌0.37%，半日成交额3317.19万元|创业_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，科创创业ETF（159781）跌0.37%，报0.532元，成交额3317.19万元。科创创业ETF（159781）重仓股方面， 宁德时代 截止午盘跌1.13%， 中芯国际 跌0.23%， 汇川技术 跌0.05%， 迈瑞医疗 跌1.30%， 海光信息 跌0.68%， 寒武纪 涨0.31%， 阳光电源 跌2.96%， 澜起科技 涨1.02%， 中际旭创 涨3.03%， 中微公司 涨0.63%。
科创创业ETF（159781）业绩比较基准为中证科创创业50指数收益率，管理人为易方达基金管理有限公司，基金经理为成曦、伍臣东，成立（2021-06-28）以来回报为-46.55%，近一个月回报为0.15%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: Admin Martin
title: Agent of striker makes travel plans that hints at potential Arsenal move
text:
Arsenal remains highly interested in signing Dusan Vlahovic, with the possibility of a move materialising in the current transfer window following the injury to Gabriel Jesus. The Brazilian striker’s injury, alongside Bukayo Saka’s and several other key players being sidelined, could push Arsenal to take immediate action in the market this month.
Initially, Arsenal had planned to wait until the end of the season before making any significant moves in the transfer market. However, with the team struggling with injury concerns, particularly in attack, the Gunners may be forced to adjust their strategy and strengthen their squad now.
The most pressing need for Arsenal at this stage is bolstering their attacking options, and a striker has become a priority for the club. With a number of high-profile players being unavailable in January, the transfer window is often a challenging time to secure top talent. Nevertheless, the situation surrounding Vlahovic at Juventus has opened up the possibility of a transfer.
Juventus has been in negotiations with Vlahovic over a new contract, but the two parties have struggled to come to terms. This ongoing impasse could lead the Italian giants to consider selling the Serbian striker, particularly if he continues to reject their contract proposals.
In a development that suggests Vlahovic could be on the move, Italian publication Tuttosport reports that his agent is travelling to Turin, possibly for a meeting to discuss the player’s future. If Vlahovic does not reach an agreement with Juventus in the near future, the club may be inclined to sell him, and Arsenal could be ready to take advantage of the situation.
Should Vlahovic become available this month, he would be a world-class addition to the Arsenal squad. The striker’s physical presence, finishing ability, and experience in one of Europe’s top leagues make him an ideal fit for the Gunners’ needs. Arsenal must act quickly and decisively if they wish to secure the Serbian forward’s services during this window.
Adding Vlahovic to their ranks would significantly enhance Arsenal’s attacking options and strengthen their pursuit of the Premier League title. With the transfer window still open, the Gunners will be hoping to conclude a deal that could prove pivotal in the second half of the season.

author: Raina Shukla
title: कूलर का पानी न बन जाए काल, करें मच्छरों का इलाज...ना न्योते डेंगू-चिकनगुनिया!
text:
कूलर का पानी न बन जाए काल, कर लें मच्छरों का इलाज...रखें सफाई, इन हरकतों से ना भेजें डेंगू-चिकनगुनिया को न्योता
Reported by:
Edited by:
Agency:
Local18Last Updated:
Prevention Tips For Dengue & Chikungunya: बरसात का सीजन या मच्छरों से होने वाली बीमारी का भी सीजन. इससे निपटने के लिए जिले में मेडिकल व्यवस्था दुरुस्त है लेकिन लोगों को भी समुचित बचाव के उपाय अपनाने चाहिए.
हाइलाइट्स
- जिले में डेंगू और चिकनगुनिया के इलाज के लिए 20 बेड आरक्षित.
- सफाई रखें, पानी जमा न होने दें, मच्छरों से बचाव करें.
- डेंगू जांच के लिए 750 एंटीजन किट उपलब्ध.
Dengue Chikungunya Precautions: जिले में जैसे-जैसे मानसून सक्रिय हो रहा है, वैसे-वैसे डेंगू और चिकनगुनिया जैसी मच्छरजनित बीमारियों का खतरा भी बढ़ता जा रहा है. साथ ही मरीजों की संख्या सदर अस्पताल में लगातार बढ़ रही है. इसे लेकर रोहतास जिला स्वास्थ्य विभाग ने अलर्ट मोड में काम शुरू कर दिया है. सिविल सर्जन डॉ. मणिराज रंजन ने बताया कि जिले में संभावित मरीजों के इलाज के लिए विशेष प्रबंध किए गए हैं.
कर ली गई है पूरी तैयारी
उन्होंने बताया कि पूरे जिले में डेंगू और चिकनगुनिया के इलाज के लिए 20 बेड आरक्षित किए गए हैं. इनमें से 10 बेड सासाराम सदर अस्पताल में, जबकि 5-5 बेड बिक्रमगंज अनुमंडलीय अस्पताल और सासाराम अनुमंडलीय अस्पताल में सुरक्षित रखे गए हैं. सभी संबंधित डॉक्टरों और नर्सों की तैनाती भी कर दी गई है ताकि मरीजों को तुरंत इलाज मिल सके.
उन्होंने बताया कि पूरे जिले में डेंगू और चिकनगुनिया के इलाज के लिए 20 बेड आरक्षित किए गए हैं. इनमें से 10 बेड सासाराम सदर अस्पताल में, जबकि 5-5 बेड बिक्रमगंज अनुमंडलीय अस्पताल और सासाराम अनुमंडलीय अस्पताल में सुरक्षित रखे गए हैं. सभी संबंधित डॉक्टरों और नर्सों की तैनाती भी कर दी गई है ताकि मरीजों को तुरंत इलाज मिल सके.
प्लेटलेट्स की भी व्यवस्था
डॉ. रंजन ने बताया कि जरूरत पड़ने पर प्लेटलेट्स की उपलब्धता सुनिश्चित करने के लिए जिला प्रशासन तैयार है. अगर अस्पताल में प्लेटलेट्स की कमी होती है, तो उसे पटना के पीएमसीएच, एनएमसीएच या अन्य प्रमुख सरकारी अस्पतालों से मंगवाया जाएगा. गंभीर मरीजों को सरकारी एंबुलेंस से तुरंत बड़े अस्पतालों में रेफर किया जाएगा.
डॉ. रंजन ने बताया कि जरूरत पड़ने पर प्लेटलेट्स की उपलब्धता सुनिश्चित करने के लिए जिला प्रशासन तैयार है. अगर अस्पताल में प्लेटलेट्स की कमी होती है, तो उसे पटना के पीएमसीएच, एनएमसीएच या अन्य प्रमुख सरकारी अस्पतालों से मंगवाया जाएगा. गंभीर मरीजों को सरकारी एंबुलेंस से तुरंत बड़े अस्पतालों में रेफर किया जाएगा.
उन्होंने यह भी बताया कि जिले में डेंगू की जांच के लिए 750 एंटीजन किट उपलब्ध हैं. इसके अलावा मच्छर नियंत्रण के लिए फॉगिंग मशीन और जरूरी दवाएं भी हर स्तर पर उपलब्ध करा दी गई हैं.
बचाव जरूरी है
सिविल सर्जन ने बताया कि लोग अपने घर और आस-पास सफाई बनाए रखें. पुराने टायर, कप-प्लेट, गमले या किसी भी ऐसी जगह पर पानी जमा न होने दें, क्योंकि इन्हीं में डेंगू और चिकनगुनिया के मच्छरों के लार्वा पनपते हैं. नगर निकायों को भी निर्देशित किया गया है कि वे नियमित रूप से फॉगिंग कराएं और मच्छरों की रोकथाम के लिए अभियान चलाएं.
सिविल सर्जन ने बताया कि लोग अपने घर और आस-पास सफाई बनाए रखें. पुराने टायर, कप-प्लेट, गमले या किसी भी ऐसी जगह पर पानी जमा न होने दें, क्योंकि इन्हीं में डेंगू और चिकनगुनिया के मच्छरों के लार्वा पनपते हैं. नगर निकायों को भी निर्देशित किया गया है कि वे नियमित रूप से फॉगिंग कराएं और मच्छरों की रोकथाम के लिए अभियान चलाएं.
प्रखंड स्तर पर भी दवाएं उपलब्ध कराई गई हैं. अगर किसी व्यक्ति में डेंगू या चिकनगुनिया के लक्षण नजर आते हैं, तो वह तुरंत नजदीकी स्वास्थ्य केंद्र या अस्पताल में संपर्क करें. गंभीर स्थिति में मरीज को एंबुलेंस से जिला मुख्यालय लाकर समुचित इलाज की व्यवस्था की गई है.
बिहार की ताजा खबरेंपढ़ने के लिए क्लिक करें.
और पढ़ें

author: Ronil Thakkar
title: New PS3 emulator from RPCS3 founder could come to Android
text:
The PS3 emulation on Android could soon get the surprise of a new RPCS3 port, aPS3e.
While this is not the first attempt at bringing RPCS3 to Android—an earlier port was developed by the creator of the Nintendo Switch emulator Sudachi—another, more credible developer is now working on a fresh port.
Named simply RPCS3-Android, this project is spearheaded by DH, one of the original founders of the RPCS3 emulator. (via Android Authority )
DH played a crucial role in the emulator’s early development, co-founding the project in 2011 and laying the groundwork for the most advanced PS3 emulator available.
However, they departed in 2016 to focus on RPCSX, a PlayStation 4 emulator. Since DH’s departure, RPCS3 has continued to evolve under a team of dedicated full-time and part-time developers.
New PS3 emulator from RPCS3 for Android could be in the works Interestingly, the current RPCS3 development team has previously expressed little interest in creating an Android version of the emulator. Their reluctance stems from the toxicity within the Android emulation community.
Despite this stance, an ARM version of RPCS3 was officially released in December of last year.
This development has now paved the way for DH’s new project, which is expected to deliver a more stable and legitimate PS3 emulation experience than its predecessors.
The arrival of RPCS3-Android is particularly notable given the controversy surrounding aPS3e, which was built on stolen code and violated multiple open-source licenses.
Despite gaining attention, the aPS3e project ultimately faced backlash after its developer was caught soliciting donations for work that largely consisted of repurposed code from the RPCS3 ARM build.
Consequently, GitHub removed aPS3e’s repository, and its credibility within the emulation community has suffered.
Currently, RPCS3-Android is still in early development, and a finished build is not yet available. It may take weeks or even months before the emulator is usable.
However, with a respected and knowledgeable developer leading the effort, reliable PS3 emulation on Android could finally become a reality in 2025.
Are you looking forward to this emulator? What emulators do you currently use on Android? Tell us below in the comments, or reach us for a chat via our Twitter or Facebook .

text:
Bloomfield Hills' premier senior care provider, Alliance Senior Care, reaffirms its commitment to delivering exceptional home care services, ensuring seniors thrive independently with personalized, compassionate support. This declaration reinforces the agency’s dedication to meeting the demand for high-quality home care in West Bloomfield Hills, MI, emphasizing its commitment to enhancing the lives of seniors and their families with unparalleled support. The agency's sustained focus on delivering personalized, compassionate care ensures that every family seeking senior care in Bloomfield Hills, MI, can expect exceptional service tailored to the well-being and comfort of their loved ones at home.
“At Alliance Senior Care, we understand the importance of maintaining the highest standards of care for our seniors,” said Dina Hurnevich, owner of Alliance Senior Care. “Our unwavering commitment to the community drives us to continually improve and adapt our services to meet the evolving needs of families in Bloomfield Hills and West Bloomfield Hills. By focusing on personalized, compassionate care, we ensure that each senior in our care experiences a fulfilling, dignified life.”
Alliance Senior Care’s approach is deeply personalized, aiming to meet each client's unique needs. From essential assistance with daily activities to comprehensive care plans, this tailored strategy guarantees seniors an enhanced quality of life, fostering independence, comfort, and overall well-being.
For more information about Alliance Senior Care and their senior care in Bloomfield Hills, MI , please visit their website at https://alliancesrcare.com

author: @hypebeast
title: Paul Pfeiffer Exhibition MOCA Geffen Contemporary | Hypebeast
text: Paul Pfeiffer Dissects the Cult of Celebrity in MOCA ExhibitionOn view at the Geffen Contemporary in DTLA. American artist [Paul Pfeiffer](https://www.perrotin.com/artists/Paul_Pfeiffer/226#biography) has been interrogating the act of image making for 25 years. Working across a wide range of creative disciplines, he commonly employs found and source material from pop culture to probe into the spectacle of sports and the myth of celebrity. On view at [MOCA](https://hypebeast.com/tags/moca)‘s Geffen Contemporary in Los Angeles, Pfeiffer presents a thorough look into his nearly three decade career. As the first US retrospective on the artist, Prologue to the Story of the Birth of Freedom unpacks society’s obsession with spectacle and how our collective consciousness is constructed through image circulation. True to his deconstructionist aesthetic, Pfeiffer tinkers with audiences’ perceptions by meticulously reframing scenes from years past. Three Figures in a Room (2015-18) showcases the highly anticipated 2015 fight between [Floyd Mayweather](https://hypebeast.com/tags/floyd-mayweather) and [Manny Pacquiao](https://hypebeast.com/tags/manny-pacquiao) on two large screens — one without sound and the other emitting imitation effects of humans being punched while the body of the aggressor is left invisible. Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse (2000-) draws from the biblical accounts in the New Testament Book of Revelation, where an [NBA](https://hypebeast.com/tags/nba) hooper is shown from below leaping towards the basket. But instead of a backboard or jersey to delineate his pursuit, the basketball player is left blank, arms outstretched in a quasi-martyr pose, hovering against a sea of chanting spectators. “In Pfeiffer’s universe, the boxing ring, the basketball court and the stadium serve not only as platforms for grand spectacles, but as sites where the body politic (of a nation, of a community, of society) is defined and contested,” [described](https://www.wallpaper.com/art/exhibitions-shows/paul-pfeiffers-digital-image-manipulations-in-la-dissect-celebrity-culture) MOCA curator Clara Kim. The show’s location isn’t by chance either. Viewed by many as the entertainment capital of the world, Los Angeles is “a city singularly poised to create,” noted MOCA’s director, Johanna Burton, “and manipulate – dreams, symbols, and mythologies, this show will have deep resonance here.” Prologue to the Story of the Birth of Freedom [ will be on view in DTLA until June 16, 2024.](https://www.moca.org/exhibition/paul-pfeiffer-prologue-to-the-story-of-the-birth-of-freedom) The Geffen Contemporary at MOCA 152 N Central Ave Los Angeles, CA 90012
